name: Poke-Ball
description: The classic. Always there when you need it.

name: Great-Ball
description: Increased catch rates. Affordable and dependable.

name: Ultra-Ball
description: The best catch rates. Premium performance and quality.

name: Master-Ball
description: Guaranteed catch. It doesn't get any better than this.

name: Potion
description: Quick results to get your team back in the game.

name: Super-Potion
description: Keep your pokemon in fighting shape. Instant results.

name: Hyper-Potion
description: The ultimate saver. Keep yourself in the match.

name: Revive
description: For those moments you thought the fight was already over.
